alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Logan County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 08 at 2:37PM MST until November 09 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MST WEDNESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE NORTH-CENTRAL PLAINS AND EAST-CENTRAL PLAINS... The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM MST Wednesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 242, 243 and 248. * Timing...Wednesday from 11 AM to 7 PM MST. * Winds...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Impacts...Above normal temperatures, low relative humidity, and breezy conditions could lead to rapid fire spread for ready to burn fuels. Avoid any burning or outdoor activities that may produce a spark and start a wildfire.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Logan County; Northeast Weld County
